short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is the IVRPowers extension for Screensharing support in the Video Gateway WebRTC

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: VideoRTC Screensharing is a chrome extension that supports to share a screen or window application from the Agent during an advanced Call Center interaction with Users.
